恠字的基本解释

恠
guài
同“怪”。

恠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guài］
［《廣韻》古壞切，去怪，見。］
亦作“恠1”。
(1)奇异，罕见。
(2)奇异的事物。
(3)惊异，觉得奇怪。
(4)怪不得，难怪。
(5)责怪，埋怨。
(6)引申为讨厌。
(7)很，非常。
(8)姓。上古炎帝臣有怪义。见《春秋元命苞》。

恠字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恠； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页384第31
俗怪字。顏眞卿學王羲之東方朔贊，怪作恠，以就楷法。俗因誤从在。

恠字的源字形

恠
Basic explanation of words
恠
guài
Same as "strange".
恠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guài］
["Guangyun" is old and bad, go to blame, see. ]
Also known as "恠1".
(1) Strange and rare.
(2) Strange things.
(3) Surprised, feel strange.
(4) No wonder, no wonder.
(5) Blame and complain.
(6) The extension is annoying.
(7) Very, very.
(8) Last name. The ancient Yandi officials had strange meanings. See "Spring and Autumn Yuan Mingbao".
恠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　恠; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 384 31
Vulgar words. Yan Suqing learns from Wang Xizhi's Dongfang Shuo Zan, and is a stranger, so as to follow the law. The common cause is wrong.
